verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֡ה <S%H859><s%> you הַקְרֵ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> And take אֵלֶיךָ֩ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> thou unto thee Aaron אָחִ֜יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> from מִתּ֛וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> with him from among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <S%H3547><s%> that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י אַהֲרֹ֕ן <S%H175><s%> [even] Aaron נָדָ֧ב <S%H5070><s%> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֛וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָ֖ר <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> Aaron's

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make בִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> garments קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> for Aaron אָחִ֑יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother לְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> for glory וּלְתִפְאָֽרֶת׃ <S%H8597><s%> and for beauty

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> You תְּדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> And thou shalt speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַכְמֵי־ <S%H2450><s%> unto all [that are] wise לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom מִלֵּאתִ֖יו <S%H4390><s%> whom I have filled ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> with the spirit חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom וְעָשׂ֞וּ <S%H6213><s%> that they may make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֧י <S%H899><s%> garments אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron's לְקַדְּשׁ֖וֹ <S%H6942><s%> to consecrate לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <S%H3547><s%> him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַבְּגָדִ֜ים <S%H899><s%> And these [are] the garments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> which they shall make חֹ֤שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> a breastplate וְאֵפוֹד֙ <S%H646><s%> and an ephod וּמְעִ֔יל <S%H4598><s%> and a robe וּכְתֹ֥נֶת <S%H3801><s%> coat תַּשְׁבֵּ֖ץ <S%H8665><s%> and a broidered מִצְנֶ֣פֶת <S%H4701><s%> a mitre וְאַבְנֵ֑ט <S%H73><s%> and a girdle וְעָשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> and they shall make בִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> garments קֹ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> holy לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> for Aaron אָחִ֛יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother וּלְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <S%H3547><s%> that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> They יִקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּכֵ֖לֶת <S%H8504><s%> and blue וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֑ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and the scarlet וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <S%H8336><s%> and fine linen פ

וְעָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they shall make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> the ephod זָ֠הָב <S%H2091><s%> [of] gold תְּכֵ֨לֶת <S%H8504><s%> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֜ן <S%H713><s%> and [of] purple תּוֹלַ֧עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֛י <S%H8144><s%> scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֖ר <S%H7806><s%> and fine twined מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> work חֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H2803><s%> with cunning

שְׁתֵּ֧י <S%H8147><s%> It shall have the two כְתֵפֹ֣ת <S%H3802><s%> shoulderpieces חֹֽבְרֹ֗ת <S%H2266><s%> thereof joined יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall have לּ֛וֹ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> at the two קְצוֹתָ֖יו <S%H7098><s%> edges וְחֻבָּֽר׃ <S%H2266><s%> thereof and [so] it shall be joined together

וְחֵ֤שֶׁב <S%H2805><s%> And the curious girdle אֲפֻדָּתוֹ֙ <S%H642><s%> of the ephod אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <S%H4639><s%> which [is] upon it shall be of the same according to the work מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> of the same יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> thereof [even of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> and fine twined

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> two אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones שֹׁ֑הַם <S%H7718><s%> onyx וּפִתַּחְתָּ֣ <S%H6605><s%> and grave עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁמ֖וֹת <S%H8034><s%> on them the names בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

שִׁשָּׁה֙ <S%H8337><s%> Six מִשְּׁמֹתָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> of their names עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and הָאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> on one וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֞וֹת <S%H8034><s%> names הַשִּׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> and [the other] six הַנּוֹתָרִ֛ים <S%H3498><s%> of the rest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> on the other כְּתוֹלְדֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8435><s%> according to their birth

מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> With the work חָרַשׁ֮ <S%H2796><s%> of an engraver אֶבֶן֒ <S%H68><s%> in stone פִּתּוּחֵ֣י <S%H6603><s%> [like] the engravings חֹתָ֗ם <S%H2368><s%> of a signet תְּפַתַּח֙ <S%H6605><s%> shalt thou engrave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> the two הָאֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> stones עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according שְׁמֹ֖ת <S%H8034><s%> with the names בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֻסַבֹּ֛ת <S%H4142><s%> them to be set מִשְׁבְּצ֥וֹת <S%H4865><s%> in ouches זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt make אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְשַׂמְתָּ֞ <S%H7760><s%> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> the two הָאֲבָנִ֗ים <S%H68><s%> stones עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on כִּתְפֹ֣ת <S%H3802><s%> upon the shoulders הָֽאֵפֹ֔ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod אַבְנֵ֥י <S%H68><s%> [for] stones זִכָּרֹ֖ן <S%H2146><s%> of memorial לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנָשָׂא֩ <S%H5375><s%> shall bear אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוֹתָ֜ם <S%H8034><s%> their names לִפְנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> upon his two כְתֵפָ֖יו <S%H3802><s%> shoulders לְזִכָּרֹֽן׃ <S%H2146><s%> for a memorial ס
וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make מִשְׁבְּצֹ֖ת <S%H4865><s%> ouches זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> [of] gold

וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> And two שַׁרְשְׁרֹת֙ <S%H8333><s%> chains זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָה֔וֹר <S%H2889><s%> [of] pure מִגְבָּלֹ֛ת <S%H4020><s%> at the ends תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work עֲבֹ֑ת <S%H5688><s%> [of] wreathen וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <S%H5414><s%> them and fasten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁרְשְׁרֹ֥ת <S%H8333><s%> chains הָעֲבֹתֹ֖ת <S%H5688><s%> the wreathen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַֽמִּשְׁבְּצֹֽת׃ <S%H4865><s%> to the ouches ס

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make חֹ֤שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> the breastplate מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work חֹשֵׁ֔ב <S%H2803><s%> with cunning כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> after the work אֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod תַּעֲשֶׂ֑נּוּ <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt make זָ֠הָב <S%H2091><s%> it [of] gold תְּכֵ֨לֶת <S%H8504><s%> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֜ן <S%H713><s%> and [of] purple וְתוֹלַ֧עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֛י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֖ר <S%H7806><s%> and [of] fine twined תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

רָב֥וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> Foursquare יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָּפ֑וּל <S%H3717><s%> it shall be [being] doubled זֶ֥רֶת <S%H2239><s%> a span אָרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H753><s%> [shall be] the length וְזֶ֥רֶת <S%H2239><s%> thereof and a span רָחְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7341><s%> [shall be] the breadth

וּמִלֵּאתָ֥ <S%H4390><s%> And thou shalt set בוֹ֙ מִלֻּ֣אַת <S%H4396><s%> in it settings אֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stones אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> [even] four טוּרִ֣ים <S%H2905><s%> rows אָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stones ט֗וּר <S%H2905><s%> [the first] row אֹ֤דֶם <S%H124><s%> [shall be] a sardius פִּטְדָה֙ <S%H6357><s%> a topaz וּבָרֶ֔קֶת <S%H1304><s%> and a carbuncle הַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> row הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> [this shall be] the first
וְהַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> row הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> And the second נֹ֥פֶךְ <S%H5306><s%> [shall be] an emerald סַפִּ֖יר <S%H5601><s%> a sapphire וְיָהֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H3095><s%> and a diamond
וְהַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> row הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> And the third לֶ֥שֶׁם <S%H3958><s%> a ligure שְׁב֖וֹ <S%H7618><s%> an agate וְאַחְלָֽמָה׃ <S%H306><s%> and an amethyst

וְהַטּוּר֙ <S%H2905><s%> row הָרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> And the fourth תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> a beryl וְשֹׁ֖הַם <S%H7718><s%> and an onyx וְיָשְׁפֵ֑ה <S%H3471><s%> and a jasper מְשֻׁבָּצִ֥ים <S%H7660><s%> they shall be set זָהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> in gold יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּמִלּוּאֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4396><s%> in their inclosings

וְ֠הָאֲבָנִים <S%H68><s%> And the stones תִּֽהְיֶ֜יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> shall be according שְׁמֹ֧ת <S%H8034><s%> shall be with the names בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according שְׁמֹתָ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> according to their names פִּתּוּחֵ֤י <S%H6603><s%> [like] the engravings חוֹתָם֙ <S%H2368><s%> of a signet אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> with his name תִּֽהְיֶ֕יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten שָֽׁבֶט׃ <S%H7626><s%> tribes

וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> upon the breastplate שַֽׁרְשֹׁ֥ת <S%H8331><s%> chains גַּבְלֻ֖ת <S%H1383><s%> at the ends מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work עֲבֹ֑ת <S%H5688><s%> [of] wreathen זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> [of] pure

וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> upon the breastplate שְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> two טַבְּע֣וֹת <S%H2885><s%> rings זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְנָתַתָּ֗ <S%H5414><s%> and shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> the two הַטַּבָּע֔וֹת <S%H2885><s%> rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> on the two קְצ֥וֹת <S%H7098><s%> ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H2833><s%> of the breastplate

וְנָתַתָּ֗ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> the two עֲבֹתֹ֣ת <S%H5688><s%> wreathen הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> [chains] of gold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> in the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <S%H2885><s%> rings אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at קְצ֖וֹת <S%H7098><s%> [which are] on the ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H2833><s%> of the breastplate
